alert.note: Alert for Central Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:54PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Orangeburg County through 330 PM EDT... At 253 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bowman, or 9 miles southeast of Orangeburg, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Brookdale, Bowman, Orangeburg County Airport, Claflin College, Edisto Gardens, South Carolina State University, Rowesville, Wilkinson Heights, Prince of Orange Mall, Edisto and Yonder Field. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 141 and 161. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
